lead_paragraph: Denis Watson shot a four-under 68 to take a one-stroke lead over Jim Thorpe and Brad Bryant into the final round of the Champion Tour’s season-ending Charles Schwab Championship in Sonoma, Calif.
snippet: Denis Watson shot a four-under 68 to take a one-stroke lead over Jim Thorpe and Brad Bryant into the final round of the Champion Tour’s season-ending Charles Schwab Championship in Sonoma, Calif.
